title: Rescue the Grand Duke
content:
select your team and spells before you reach Iron Throne. Once you land on Iron Throne, you will have only 6 turns to extract as many prisoners as possible. Dimensional door, and Teleportation Circle spells are very helpful, as well as Potion of Speed. If you turned down Mizora, she will appear once you freed the duke. Defeat her summoning, and don't let the explosion kill the duke. Once you escaped Iron Throne, return to camp to talk to him.

Search for survivors.

This event is triggered as y
